application-security.title: Application Security
application-security.desc: Protect your applications from vulnerabilities and cyber threats with advanced security solutions.
application-security.longDesc: Our Application Security service provides comprehensive protection for your business applications. We implement multiple layers of security controls, conduct regular security assessments, and integrate security best practices throughout the development lifecycle to ensure your applications remain secure against evolving cyber threats.

black-box-testing.title: Black Box Testing
black-box-testing.desc: Simulate real-world attacks to identify and fix security weaknesses in your systems.
black-box-testing.longDesc: Our Black Box Testing service simulates real-world cyber attacks to identify vulnerabilities in your systems. Using advanced testing methodologies, we evaluate your security posture from an attacker's perspective and provide detailed remediation guidance.

about.title: About ETQAA
about.subtitle: A leading Saudi cybersecurity firm dedicated to providing high-quality services to government entities and businesses.
about.intro: We specialize in delivering tailored solutions that protect sensitive data and uphold national interests in today's digital age. Our expert team leverages cutting-edge technologies to ensure client security, covering threat detection, risk management, and compliance.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: In an increasingly complex digital landscape, ETQAA's mission is to enhance organizational resilience and secure critical assets against evolving cyber threats. We take a holistic approach, integrating governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) frameworks, security assessments, and operational support to safeguard our clients' digital frontiers.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: At ETQAA, we strive to be the trusted partner for cybersecurity in Saudi Arabia, protecting organizations across sectors through innovative solutions, expert insights, and a commitment to excellence.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to answer your questions and help bring your vision to life

meta.title: Contact ETQAA | Cybersecurity Experts
meta.description: Protect your business with ETQAA's leading cybersecurity solutions. Contact us to secure your digital assets and ensure your organization's safety.
